mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO, CONTENT, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, SEQ, COMMENT_DATE, USER_ID, COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO, NICKNAME FROM COMMENT AS CMT LEFT JOIN USER AS USR ON CMT.USER_ID = USR.ID WHERE COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO = #{board_no} ORDER BY PARENT_COMMENT_NO ASC, SEQ ASC;

SELECT COMMENT_NO, CONTENT, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, SEQ, COMMENT_DATE, USER_ID, COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO, NICKNAME FROM COMMENT AS CMT LEFT JOIN USER AS USR ON CMT.USER_ID = USR.ID WHERE COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND PARENT_COMMENT_NO = #{comment_no} ORDER BY PARENT_COMMENT_NO ASC, SEQ ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO = #{board_no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT(CONTENT, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, USER_ID, COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO) VALUE (#{comment.content}, (SELECT COMMENT_NO FROM COMMENT AS CMT ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC LIMIT 1) + 1, #{comment.user_id}, #{comment.community_board_no});

INSERT INTO COMMENT(CONTENT, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, USER_ID, COMMUNITY_BOARD_NO, SEQ) VALUE (#{comment_reply.content}, #{comment_reply.parent_comment_no}, #{comment_reply.user_id}, #{comment_reply.community_board_no}, (SELECT SEQ FROM COMMENT AS CMT WHERE PARENT_COMMENT_NO = 1 ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) + 1);
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{updated_comment.content} WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{comment_no};
